meanings.definition: To embroider with a needle and thread.
meanings.sent1: She loves to broider flowers on her dresses.
meanings.sent2: She decided to broider her initials on the handkerchief.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to broider its toy mouse with yarn.
meanings.sent4: The stars seemed to broider the night sky with their twinkling light.
meanings.sent5: Her skilled hands broidered a beautiful design on the fabric.

meanings.sent5: The artist would broider the canvas with fine details.
